activities: Leaf Group Ltd is an internet company which owns and operates consumer media and marketplace businesses. This safe harbor pertains to those sites in which Leaf Group takes personally identifiable information (PII). An example of a Leaf Group's privacy policy is as follows: https://www.leafgroup.com/privacy-policy/. This Privacy Policy ("Privacy Policy" or the "Policy") sets out how Leaf Group uses and processes end users personal information (meaning any information about and end user that is personally identifiable or can be related back to end user like  name, date of birth, address, telephone number, email address and queries) ("PII") that Leaf Group may collect about and end user when an end user uses the services Leaf Group provides or purchases goods or services from Leaf Group websites.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: independent dispute resolution mechanism operated by the Council of Better Business Bureaus (BBB)
